snippet: Gunmen stormed a college in northern Nigeria on Wednesday, firing on fleeing students and setting off an explosion in an attack that killed at least 15 people and wounded 35, the police said.
abstract: Gunmen storm a college in northern Nigeria, firing on fleeing students and setting off an explosion in an attack that killed at least 15 people and wounded 35.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen stormed a college in northern Nigeria on Wednesday, firing on fleeing students and setting off an explosion in an attack that killed at least 15 people and wounded 35, the police said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Gunmen Strike College, Killing at Least 15
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Gunmen Strike College, Killing at Least 15
